features: Fully recycled materials feature embossed lining for enhanced aesthetic appeal
100% recycled synthetic insulation provides warmth even when wet
Extended width in knees for maximum comfort and mobility
Wraparound J-zip allows for increased mobility and venting
Fitted hood for warmth and comfort
Draft collar for comfort and preventing heat loss
Tie-down loops for securing bag to sleeping pad
tech_specs.\u2022 Total Weight: Reg - 5 Lbs. 8 Oz (2500 G) / Long - 5 Lbs. 15 Oz (2690 G) / Extra Long - 6 Lbs. 11 Oz (3045 G)
tech_specs.\u2022 Stuffsack Size: Reg/Long - 12" X 22" (30.5 Cm X 56 Cm) / Extra Long - 13" X 24" (33.02 Cm X 60.96 Cm)
tech_specs.\u2022 Shell: 50D 100% Recycled Polyester Ripstop With Non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (Non-PFC DWR) Finish
